member.name: T:GameCore.ScopeData.DamageType
member.summary: Contains game data links for different types of damage that can be dealt in the game.

member.name: F:GameCore.ScopeData.DamageType.Physical
member.summary: Physical damage type - typically reduced by armor.

member.name: F:GameCore.ScopeData.DamageType.Magical
member.summary: Magical damage type - typically reduced by magic resistance.

member.name: F:GameCore.ScopeData.DamageType.Pure
member.summary: Pure damage type - bypasses armor and magic resistance.

member.name: T:GameCore.ScopeData.UnitProperty
member.summary: Contains game data links for unit properties that define characteristics and capabilities of game units.

member.name: F:GameCore.ScopeData.UnitProperty.LifeMax
member.summary: Maximum health points of a unit.

member.name: F:GameCore.ScopeData.UnitProperty.ManaMax
member.summary: Maximum mana points of a unit.

member.name: F:GameCore.ScopeData.UnitProperty.Sight
member.summary: Vision range of a unit.

member.name: F:GameCore.ScopeData.UnitProperty.Armor
member.summary: Physical damage reduction capability.

member.name: F:GameCore.ScopeData.UnitProperty.MagicResistance
member.summary: Magical damage reduction capability.

member.name: F:GameCore.ScopeData.UnitProperty.MoveSpeed
member.summary: Movement speed of the unit.

member.name: F:GameCore.ScopeData.UnitProperty.ShrubSight
member.summary: Vision range through shrubs and obstacles.

member.name: F:GameCore.ScopeData.UnitProperty.Height
member.summary: Physical height of the unit.

member.name: F:GameCore.ScopeData.UnitProperty.SightBlockRadius
member.summary: Radius around the unit that blocks sight.

member.name: F:GameCore.ScopeData.UnitProperty.TurningSpeed
member.summary: Speed at which the unit can rotate.

member.name: F:GameCore.ScopeData.UnitProperty.AttackRange
member.summary: Maximum distance from which the unit can attack.

member.name: F:GameCore.ScopeData.UnitProperty.AttackDamage
member.summary: The damage of the unit's attack.

member.name: F:GameCore.ScopeData.UnitProperty.InventoryPickUpRange
member.summary: Range within which the unit can pick up items.

member.name: F:GameCore.ScopeData.UnitProperty.LevelMax
member.summary: Maximum level the unit can reach.

member.name: F:GameCore.ScopeData.UnitProperty.ExperienceDistributionMultiplier
member.summary: Multiplier for experience distribution calculations.

member.name: F:GameCore.ScopeData.AI.Default
member.summary: Default AI for units. It just randomly cast abilities on nearby enemies.

member.name: T:GameCore.ScopeData.ActorScope
member.summary: Id cannot conflict with Unit
